Proposed Storyline for 50 project

Episodes 1-2: You heard about a city awarding a contract to guard it. 
 You and your friends are going to compete to win that contract.

Episodes 3-7: You have to defending the city on its various fronts.

Episodes 8-10: An invading army tries to besiege the city by keeping 
people from going and coming to the city.

Episode 11-12: The invading army is too powerfull so you have to 
evacute the citizens.

Episode 13: You have to guard the citizens while they sleep in the 
forest.  Note: this will 3-4 civilians surrounded by a fort with 
doors.

Episodes 14-16: You find an entire city occupied by the undead and 
decide to clear out it to make room for the citizens.

Episode 17-18: A group of bandit clerics (who just robbed a bank) 
return to the city to reclaim it.

Episodes 19-20: You decide to return the treasure that the clerics 
stole. Unfortunately, thieves are waiting for you along the way.

Episode 21-22: You return to the city, after receiving a reward, to 
find the citizens captured. You have to rescue them.  Note: this will 
have 2-4 prisoners in a protected cell with gates as doors; they won't 
appear until episode 24.

Episode 23: You increase the defenses of your city while guarding it.

Episodes 24-25: You fight tooth-and-nail to reclaim the city you lost 
in the beginning.

Episodes 26-27: You escort the citizens back to their city while 
guarding them from hazards of the forest. Note: not save-the-npc 
levels, only 2-4 citizens show up.

Episodes 28-30: You built a completely underground tunnel counting the 
two cities. You station a small part of your forces in the 2nd city.  
The majority of your army runs off to secure a newly nearly abandoned 
city. Unfortunately, you soon discover why the city is nearly 
abandoned.

Episodes 31-33: You venture off to win a contract to protect a fourth 
city, one with a harbor.

Episodes 34-36: You had it coming by not screening new members of your 
army too well.  Someone from within your army has manage to gather 1/3 
of your forces against you.

Episodes 37-40: While you are rebuilding your forces, another large 
number army approaches to conquer your cities.  This time, you are 
prepared and manage to hold the opposing army at bay.

Episodes 41-42: Taking with you 1/4 of your army and leaving the rest 
behind, you sneak in the enemy camp and slaughter the forces that are 
caught off guard.

Episodes 43-45: You find a map to an abandoned mine and you take a 
small part of your army to explore it.  Unfortunately, you discover 
why the mine shaft was abandoned.

Episode 46: A group of hired mercenaries try to steal the mine away 
from you.

Episode 47-50: Magic users have aligned to uproot you and your army.

All I have to do now is start deciding individual stories for each 
scenario if the basic storyline for this 50 passes.

comments/questions/complaints
